items.title: Here’s how to score Lenovo’s (2025) Legion Go S Windows handheld for $394 at Amazon for Prime Day (Reg. $650)
items.summary:
Amazon has been rolling out some solid deals on gaming gear — including laptops, desktops, and more — as part of its ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale. If you’ve been eyeing a gaming handheld, Amazon Resale has Lenovo’s 2025 Legion Go S Windows handheld going for as low as $393.70 shipped in “Like New” condition, with a 35% Prime-only discount that automatically applies at checkout. Simply head to this link right here and add the “Used – Like New” listing to the cart from the sidebar. That’s a hefty $256 off its $650 regular price and the lowest we’ve seen so far. For reference, the brand-new model isn’t discounted at the moment, and they’re all fetching their full prices even at Best Buy, where we typically see them get a discount. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: New models are inbound, but Best Buy is offering $800 off M3 Pro MacBook Pro models right now
items.summary:
Amazon’s Prime Day M4 MacBook Air deals are live and quite notable at up to $230 off the list prices, the M4 MacBook though…not so much. You can land a solid discount on the base model M4 MBP, but after seeing solid $300 discounts for a couple months and reports suggesting stock is dwindling at Apple stores, options are thin right now. That said, if you’re looking to land a huge deal on a MacBook Pro and don’t mind a previous-gen version, Best Buy is offering up to $800 off the original list prices right now on select M3 Pro configs as part of its Techtober sale.

CryptPad Blog:
Open letter: 40+ European companies oppose the EU's “Chat Control” proposal, which forces services to scan messages for CSAM, fearing it would mandate backdoors  —  Today we are adding our signature (and that of our parent company XWiki SAS) to a new open letter against the so-called “Chat Control” EU regulation.

items.title: These EGO cordless snow blowers and 2x 7.5Ah battery kits start from a new $660 Prime Day low (Reg. $849+)
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Prime Big Deal Days, Amazon is offering the EGO Power+ 56V 21-inch Cordless Steel Auger Snow Blower with two 7.5Ah batteries at $659.99 shipped. It fetches $849 these days without any discounts, which we’ve seen taken as low as $699 over the year. The 22% Prime markdown here cuts $190 off the tag for the best new price we have tracked, giving you a handy means to prepare for snowier months ahead. Of course, if you want something even more powerful, you can find the 24-inch Cordless Self-Propelled Two-Stage Electric Snow Blower with two 7.5Ah batteries at $1,349.99 shipped, down from $1,650.

items.title: OpenAI wasn’t expecting Sora’s copyright drama
items.summary: When OpenAI released its new AI-generated video app Sora last week, it launched with an opt-out policy for copyright holders - media companies would need to expressly indicate they didn't want their AI-generated characters running rampant on the app. But after days of Nazi SpongeBob, criminal Pikachu, and Sora-philosophizing Rick and Morty, OpenAI CEO Sam […]

A website set up by a Danish software developer floods EU lawmakers with emails opposing planned EU “Chat Control” laws to fight CSAM by scanning encrypted apps  —  A software developer from Denmark is having an outsized influence on a hotly debated law to break open encrypted apps.

While that offer is largely out of stock now, the very first straight up cash deal on the already affordable Galaxy Tab solution is now live from $319.99 shipped both via the Samsung site and at Amazon.

items.title: Don’t miss Samsung’s thin and light Galaxy Chromebook while it’s $100 off for fall Prime Day
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Samsung that drops its Galaxy Chromebook Plus notebook for $599.99 shipped. This model launched at $700, jumped up to $750 not long after, and has now dropped back to its original launch price of $700. Today’s deal, however, shaves $100 off its usual going rate, marking the return of one of the lowest prices we have tracked for it to date. Only once before today have we seen this Chromebook go for less, and it’s now within $50 of that price. Best Buy is matching the price of the Chromebook as part of its ongoing Techtober sale event today, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

Little over a week ago, Strava filed a lawsuit against its long-running competitor Garmin over its patented segments and heatmaps features. Now, with Garmin still reeling from the legal trouble, Finnish brand Suunto is tagging in, suing the company alongside Strava. Instead of just two patents, Suunto accuses Garmin of infringing five different patents. These […]

items.title: All-time low price hits Anker’s 250W 6-port charging station with onboard clock/status display at $100 for Prime Day
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale, Anker’s official Amazon storefront is offering its 250W 6-port charging station for $99.99 shipped. This particular model hit the scene last year carrying a $170 price tag and has maintained that for the most part, with some occasional drops to the $110 to $120 range. Today’s deal, however, takes $70 off its usual going rate to mark the steepest price drop we’ve tracked for it to date. This is the lowest price we’ve seen this charging station fetch, and it’s now below $10 of its previous all-time low. Head below for more details, along with deals on other Anker charging stations.

more…

items.title: An analysis of 1,100 TikTok users' watch histories across six months in 2024 shows how effective TikTok is at getting even its heaviest users to watch more (Washington Post)
